name.th: โรบล็อกซ์ - เกมฟรี

short.am,ar,bn,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play Roblox as a Chrome extension - Try it now!
short.bg: Играйте в Roblox като разширение на Chrome - Опитайте сега!
short.ca,fr,uk: Jouez à Roblox en tant qu'extension Chrome - Essayez maintenant!
short.es,he: ¡Juega Roblox como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Mängi Robloxit Chrome'i laiendusena - Proovi kohe!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Roblox bilang Chrome extension - Subukan mo na!
short.hi: Juega a Roblox como una extensión de Chrome: ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.hu: Játssz Robloxt Chrome-bővítményként - Próbáld ki most!
short.it: Gioca a Roblox come estensione di Chrome - Provalo ora!
short.ja: Chrome拡張機能としてRobloxをプレイしてみてください！
short.lv: Spēlējiet Roblox kā Chrome paplašinājumu - Izmēģiniet tagad!
short.ms: Mainkan Roblox sebagai sambungan Chrome - Cuba sekarang!
short.nl: Speel Roblox als een Chrome-extensie - Probeer het nu!
short.no: Juega Roblox como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.ro: Joacă Roblox ca extensie pentru Chrome - Încearcă acum!
short.ru: Играйте в Roblox как расширение для Chrome - Попробуйте сейчас!
short.sl: Igrajte Roblox kot Chrome razširitev - Poskusite zdaj!
short.sr: Играјте Роблокс као Чром додатак - Испробајте одмах!
short.sv: Spela Roblox som en Chrome-tillägg - Prova nu!
short.th: เล่น Roblox ในรูปแบบของส่วนขยาย Chrome - ลองดูเลย!
short.vi: Chơi Roblox dưới dạng tiện ích Chrome - Hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 作为 Chrome 扩展程序玩 Roblox - 立即尝试！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎮 Explore a world of limitless possibilities with Roblox, the ultimate gaming platform where imagination knows no bounds! Dive into a vast collection of free games, each crafted by a community of talented developers. From epic adventures to competitive challenges, Roblox offers a diverse range of gaming experiences for players of all ages.

🌍 Immerse yourself in virtual realms, where creativity comes to life. Whether you're a daring adventurer, a skilled strategist, or a fashionista designing the trendiest outfits, Roblox has something for everyone. Join millions of players from around the globe and embark on thrilling quests, engage in intense battles, or simply hang out with friends in this dynamic and ever-expanding virtual universe.

🤖 Customize your avatar, unlock unique items, and showcase your individuality in a world where the only limit is your imagination. Roblox is not just a gaming platform; it's a social hub where friendships are formed, and creativity flourishes. Discover the latest trends, attend virtual events, and participate in collaborative projects that redefine the meaning of interactive entertainment.

💡 Ready to unleash your creativity and dive into a world of free games? Join Roblox today and experience the excitement of a gaming community like no other! Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a newcomer, Roblox invites you to play, create, and connect in a digital landscape where the possibilities are endless.

# Play more games on the top-left menu.
